Name: Treasure Adventure Game
About the game: Treasure Adventure Game casts you in the role of a young boy who lands on an island that is a fragment of what was once a continent, destroyed in the war between a demon and a wizard. You accept quests, travel across the oceans, and generally have a bang-up time of being a little boy in a big world, out there looking for treasure and adventure. Your equipment consists of a hat, a parrot, and a boat that appears whenever you touch water. Puzzle-platformer with a huge, open world to explore Meet mysterious other-worldy beings, and find multiple endings Diverse environments with changing weather and NPCs that are react accordingly Original music that changes with the background and creates an enchanting mood Treasure Adventure World is an HD reimagining of Treasure Adventure Game: /
